Tokeneke Classic Road Race

The road team represented the club well this past weekend at the Tokeneke Classic Road Race  Congratulations to Adam Shutes on another top 10 finish on an extremely tough course with over 4,000 ft of climbing!

Tokeneke Classic Road Race (Aug 10 2014)
Adam Shutes Men 4 35+ 7/51
William Paredes Men 5 42 / 73
Alan Potter 40+ 15 / 35
Austin Guyette Men 4 u35 15 / 24

Aug 12, 2014
